item.title: rangga add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Berputar menjadi sesuatu yang bukan kita, demi bisa menjadi diri kita lagi." -- Dee

item.title: rangga add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: rangga add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: rangga add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: rangga add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And that no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dreams, because every second of the search is a second's encounter with God and with eternity." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: rangga add a quote by Thomas Fuller
item.description: "It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn." -- Thomas Fuller

item.title: rangga add a quote by Donny Dhirgantoro 5 cm
item.description: "Sebuah cinta memang harus diungkapkan karena tidak pernah ada cinta yang disembunyikan, kecuali oleh seseorang yang terlalu mencintai dirinya sendiri." -- Donny Dhirgantoro 5 cm

item.title: rangga add a quote by dee
item.description: "kenangan itu cuma hantu di sudut pikir. selama kita diam dan ngga berbuat apa-apa, selamanya dia tetap jadi hantu, ngga akan pernah jadi kenyataan." -- dee
